metadata.title: Peculiar Semi-centennial Variability of intensity and Geographic Position Anomalies of Atmospheric Action Centers in the Asian Pacific Region

creators.name: Far Eastern Hydrometerorogical Institute, Pacific Fisheries Research Center (TINRO-Center)

metadata.description: Atmospheric action center (AAC) are important for general atmospheric circulation.  In Asian Pacific region four AACs are distinguished: North Pacific high, Aleutian low (permanent), winter Asian high and summer Asian low (seasonal).  Mean yearly pressure, longitudinal and latitudinal anomalies of AACs registered in 1947-1994 are studied on the basis of World Hydrometeorological Data Center B.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To show the peculiar Semi-centennial Variability of intensity and Geographic Position Anomalies of Atmospheric Action Centers in the Asian Pacific Region
